peregrine
Class Job

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.BaseJob<Job>
      peregrine.Job
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageSerializable
public class Job
extends BaseJob<Job>

Represents a job (map, merge, or, reduce) which much be run by Peregrine. All necessary metadata is included here and specified for an entire job.
